options.content:
Flow Data by Science Discipline

This dashboard shows information related to science disciplines for top talkers using the NetSage Science Registry.
The map shows only the top 100 pairs of organizations with at least one end tagged in the science registry. Larger dots indicate larger flows.
The Sankey graph shows the top ten source organizations by volume for the selected discipline(s) and organization(s)
and their associated top three destination organizations, with thicker lines for larger flow volumes.
Note that in the Summary tables, if only one sampled flow was detected, the rate will be zero.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Flow Volume for Selected Science Disciplines and Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)

panels.title: Number of Flows for Selected Science Disciplines and Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)

panels.title: Total Flow Volume for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)

panels.title: Total Number of Flows for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Flow Volume by Source of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Flow Volume by Destination of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors && meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline && (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

options.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only flows where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry and were seen by the selected sensor(s) are counted.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)
meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (meta.src_preferred_org:$org OR meta.dst_preferred_org:$org)

title: What are the flows by science discipline?
